scenes.action_text: The Cable Guy by Judd Apatow Based on a Screenplay by Lou Holtz Jr. Shooting Script October 31, 1995 (White) Revised Pages November 13, 1995 (Blue) Revised Pages November 14, 1995 (Pink) 1 FULL FRAME - WHITE NOISE Credits begin. The entire frame is filled with white noise within which one can make out thefaint image of a television program. Every few moments the channel changes, revealing a new ghostly image. The camera pulls back very slowly. We reveal that this image is coming from a t
